name: cookie-disclaimer
description: Dynamically add a cookie disclaimer to your website.

scripts.build: jshint src/CookieDisclaimer.js && babel src/CookieDisclaimer.js --out-file dist/CookieDisclaimer.js --plugins transform-es2015-modules-amd && uglifyjs dist/CookieDisclaimer.js -o dist/CookieDisclaimer.min.js

author: Jonny Haynes <jonny@colouringcode.com>
Oliver Farrell <oliver@oliverjfarrell.co.uk>
